lead_paragraph: The arrest was apparently the first under the country’s tough law against insulting the monarchy since King Maha Vajiralongkorn Bodindradebayavarangkun succeeded his father on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Thailand Arrests Student Accused of Sharing Article
headline.main: Thailand Arrests Student Accused of Sharing Article About New King

snippet: The arrest was apparently the first under the country’s tough law against insulting the monarchy since King Maha Vajiralongkorn Bodindradebayavarangkun succeeded his father on Thursday....
